Package explicit

Explicit-state probabilistic model checking engine, implemented in Java, and quantitative abstraction refinement techniques (see QuantAbstractRefine).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CTMC
    Interface for classes that provide (read) access to an explicit-state CTMC.
    CTMDP
    Interface for classes that provide (read) access to an explicit-state CTMDP.
    DTMC
    Interface for classes that provide (read) access to an explicit-state DTMC.
    DTMC.TransitionConsumer
    Functional interface for a consumer, accepting transitions (s,t,d), i.e., from state s to state t with value d.
    DTMC.TransitionToDoubleFunction
    Functional interface for a function mapping transitions (s,t,d), i.e., from state s to state t with value d to a double value.
    IterationMethod.IterationIntervalIter
    Interface for an object that provides the atomic steps for a value iteration in the context of interval iteration, i.e., for the interval iteration there are two IterationIntervalIter objects, one from below or from above.
    IterationMethod.IterationPostProcessor
    Functional interface for a post-processing step after an iteration that involves a pair of solution vectors.
    IterationMethod.IterationValIter
    Interface for an object that provides the basic steps for a value iteration.
    IterationMethod.SingletonSCCSolver
    Functional interface for a method that allows to determine the value for a singleton SCC in the model, given that all successor value have already been computed.
    LTS
    Interface for classes that provide (read) access to an explicit-state labelled transition system (LTS).
    MDP
    Interface for classes that provide (read) access to an explicit-state MDP, where the transition probabilities are stored as double floating point values.
    MDP.TransitionConsumer
    Functional interface for a consumer, accepting transitions (s,t,d), i.e., from state s to state t with value d.
    MDP.TransitionToDoubleFunction
    Functional interface for a function mapping transitions (s,t,d), i.e., from state s to state t with value d, to a double value.
    MDPGeneric<Value>
    Interface for classes that provide (read) access to an explicit-state MDP, gathering the generic methods, i.e., those that are independent of the underlying value type used for the transition probabilities.
    Model
    Interface for (abstract) classes that provide (read-only) access to an explicit-state model.
    ModelSimple
    Interface for simple mutable explicit-state model representations.
    ModelTransformation<OriginalModel extends Model,TransformedModel extends Model>
    Interface for a model transformation.
    NondetModel
    Interface for (abstract) classes that provide (read-only) access to an explicit-state model with nondeterminism.
    NondetModelSimple
    Interface for simple mutable explicit-state nondeterministic model representations (i.e.
    SCCConsumer
    Interface for a consumer of SCC information, for use with an SCCComputer.
    StateStorage<T>
    Interface for storing a set of objects of type T.
    STPG
    Interface for classes that provide (read) access to an explicit-state stochastic two-player game (STPG).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicModelTransformation<OM extends Model,TM extends Model>
    Base class for model transformations, providing support for mapping between states.
    BirthProcess
    Class to efficiently compute transient probabilities of a birth process.
    Bisimulation
    Class to perform bisimulation minimisation for explicit-state models.
    BRTDP
    Implementation of the upper confidence bounds applied to trees (UCT) algorithm
    BRTDP.Bound  
    BRTDP.SearchState
    Stores a state and its heuristic search related values
    BRTDPModelChecker
    MDP model checker based on BRTDP
    ConstructModel
    Class to perform explicit-state reachability and model construction.
    CTMCModelChecker
    Explicit-state model checker for continuous-time Markov chains (CTMCs).
    CTMCSimple
    Simple explicit-state representation of a CTMC.
    CTMDPModelChecker
    Explicit-state model checker for continuous-time Markov decision processes (CTMDPs).
    CTMDPSimple
    Simple explicit-state representation of a CTMDP.
    DijkstraSweepMPI
    An implementation of the upper bound computation for Rmin as detailed in the paper McMahan, Likhachev, Gordon "Bounded Real-Time Dynamic Programming: RTDP with monotone upper bounds and performance guarantees" (International Conference on Machine Learning, 2005).
    DijkstraSweepMPI.ChoiceValues  
    DijkstraSweepMPI.QueueEntry  
    Distribution
    Explicit representation of a probability distribution.
    DistributionSet
    Represents a set of distributions.
    DTMCEmbeddedSimple
    Simple explicit-state representation of a DTMC, constructed (implicitly) as the embedded DTMC of a CTMC.
    DTMCExplicit
    Base class for explicit-state representations of a DTMC.
    DTMCFromMDPAndMDStrategy
    Explicit-state representation of a DTMC, constructed (implicitly) from an MDP and a memoryless deterministic (MD) adversary.
    DTMCFromMDPMemorylessAdversary
    Explicit-state representation of a DTMC, constructed (implicitly) from an MDP and a memoryless adversary, specified as an array of integer indices.
    DTMCModelChecker
    Explicit-state model checker for discrete-time Markov chains (DTMCs).
    DTMCSimple
    Simple explicit-state representation of a DTMC.
    DTMCSparse
    Sparse matrix (non-mutable) explicit-state representation of a DTMC.
    DTMCUniformisedSimple
    Simple explicit-state representation of a DTMC, constructed (implicitly) as the uniformised DTMC of a CTMC.
    ECComputer
    Abstract class for (explicit) classes that compute (M)ECs, i.e.
    ECComputerDefault
    Explicit maximal end component computer for a nondeterministic model such as an MDP.
    ExplicitFiles2Model
    Class to convert explicit-state file storage of a model to a model of the explicit engine.
    ExportIterations
    Class for exporting / visualising the value vectors in a numerical iteration algorithm.
    FastAdaptiveUniformisation
    Implementation of fast adaptive uniformisation (FAU).
    FastAdaptiveUniformisation.StateProp
    Stores properties of states needed for fast adaptive method.
    FastAdaptiveUniformisationModelChecker
    CTMC model checker based on fast adaptive uniformisation.
    FoxGlynn  
    IncomingChoiceRelation
    A class for storing and accessing the incoming choices of an explicit NondetModel.
    IncomingChoiceRelation.Choice
    An outgoing choice from a state, i.e., the source state and the choice index
    IndexedSet<T>
    Class storing an indexed set of objects of type T.
    IterationMethod
    Abstract class that encapsulates the functionality for the different iteration methods (e.g., Power, Jacobi, Gauss-Seidel, ...).
    IterationMethodGS
    IterationMethod that encapsulates the functionality of the Gauss-Seidel method (forward/backward).
    IterationMethodJacobi
    IterationMethod that encapsulates the functionality of the Jacobi method.
    IterationMethodPower
    IterationMethod that encapsulates the functionality of the Power method.
    LTLModelChecker
    LTL model checking functionality
    LTSExplicit
    This is a minimal implementation of an explicitly stored labeled transition system.
    LTSNBAProduct
    Construction and storage for the product of the underlying labeled transition system of a model (i.e., the edge relation defined by getSuccessorsIterator()) and a non-deterministic Büchi automaton (NBA).
    LTSNBAProduct.ProductState
    A product state
    MCTSModelChecker
    MDP model checker based on MCTS
    MDPExplicit
    Base class for explicit-state representations of an MDP.
    MDPModelChecker
    Explicit-state model checker for Markov decision processes (MDPs).
    MDPSimple
    Simple explicit-state representation of an MDP.
    MDPSparse
    Sparse matrix (non-mutable) explicit-state representation of an MDP.
    MinMax
    Class to store info about types of probabilities that are to be computed (typically how to quantify over strategies, e.g.
    ModelCheckerPartialSatResult
    Class storing some info/data from a call to a model checking or numerical computation method in the explicit engine.
    ModelCheckerResult
    Class storing some info/data from a call to a model checking or numerical computation method in the explicit engine.
    ModelExplicit
    Base class for explicit-state model representations.
    NonProbModelChecker
    Explicit-state, non-probabilistic model checker.
    PredecessorRelation
    A class for storing and accessing the predecessor relation of an explicit Model.
    PrismSTPGAbstractRefine  
    ProbModelChecker
    Super class for explicit-state probabilistic model checkers.
    Product<M extends Model>
    Base class for the results of a product operation between a model and an automaton.
    QuantAbstractRefine
    Base class for implementing quantitative abstraction-refinement loop.
    QuantAbstractRefineExample  
    SCCComputer
    Abstract class for (explicit) classes that compute (B)SCCs, i.e.
    SCCComputerTarjan
    Tarjan's SCC algorithm operating on a Model object.
    SCCComputerTarjan.Node
    A small class wrapping a node.
    SCCConsumerBitSet
    Abstract base class for a consumer of SCC information, for use with an SCCComputer, where each SCC is stored as a BitSet.
    SCCConsumerBSCCs
    Abstract base class for an SCC consumer that is only interested in the bottom strongly-connected components (BSCCs).
    SCCConsumerStore
    SCC consumer that stores lists of the discovered SCCs and BSCCs.
    SCCInfo
    Storage of the SCC information, with a topological order of the SCCs.
    StateModelChecker
    Super class for explicit-state model checkers.
    StateValues
    Class for explicit-state storage of a state-indexed vector of values (int, double, boolean).
    STPGAbstrSimple
    Simple explicit-state representation of a stochastic two-player game (STPG), as used for abstraction of MDPs, i.e.
    STPGExplicit
    Simple explicit-state representation of a (turn-based) stochastic two-player game (STPG).
    STPGModelChecker
    Explicit-state model checker for two-player stochastic games (STPGs).
    SubNondetModel
    Class for creating a sub-model of any NondetModel, please note the translate* methods used to translate between state ids for model and sub-model.
    SuccessorsIterator
    Base class and static helpers for iterators over successor states.
    SuccessorsIterator.ChainedSuccessorsIterator
    Helper, chain multiple SuccessorsIterators
    SuccessorsIterator.SuccessorsIteratorEmpty
    Helper, empty iterator
    SuccessorsIterator.SuccessorsIteratorFromIterator
    Wrapper, underlying iterator is an Iterator iterator
    SuccessorsIterator.SuccessorsIteratorFromOfInt
    Wrapper, underlying iterator is an OfInt iterator
    UCT
    Implementation of the upper confidence bounds applied to trees (UCT) algorithm
    UCT.UCTNode
    Stores a UCT search node.
    Utils  
    ZeroRewardECQuotient
    Helper class for obtaining the zero-reward EC quotient of an MDP.

Package explicit Description

Explicit-state probabilistic model checking engine, implemented in Java, and quantitative abstraction refinement techniques (see QuantAbstractRefine).
